title: Snow Escape at Victoria’s Mount Buller Alpine Resort
description: Ski to your heart’s content on the runs of Mount Buller, Victoria’s most-loved Alpine village. Leave the city hustle and bustle and head for the fresh air of the Alpine region, staying two nights at the newly refurbished Duck Inn Mt Buller, ideally located five minutes' walk from the slopes. Includes daily breakfast and complimentary snow gear and clothing hire for a day.
offer_address: Goal Post Road,  Mt. Buller Alpine Village,  Victoria
